Class SimulateBookingController

java.lang.Object
SimulateBookingController
public class SimulateBookingController extends Object
The SimulateBookingController class manages the booking simulation process. It interacts with the SimulateBookingView, BookHotelView, and MainView classes and handles the actions related to hotel booking.

    • SimulateBookingController

      public SimulateBookingController(SimulateBookingView simulateBookingView, MainView mainView, Hotels myHotels)
      Constructor for SimulateBookingController. Initializes the controller with the provided views and hotel data.
      Parameters:
      simulateBookingView - The view for simulating hotel bookings.
      mainView - The main view of the application.
      myHotels - The model containing hotel data.

  • Method Details

    • initializeBookHotelView

      private void initializeBookHotelView()
      Initializes the book hotel view with necessary event listeners.

    • startBooking

      private void startBooking(Hotel hotel)
      Starts the booking process by setting up the event listeners for room selection and booking submission.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The hotel selected for booking.

    • bookRoom

      private void bookRoom(Hotel chosenHotel, Date checkIn, Date checkOut)
      Sets up the event listeners for room selection in the booking process.
      Parameters:
      chosenHotel - The hotel where the room is being booked.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.

    • setInvoice

      private void setInvoice(Hotel chosenHotel, Date checkIn, Date checkOut, Room room)
      Sets up the invoice view and confirmation for the selected room.
      Parameters:
      chosenHotel - The hotel where the room is booked.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      room - The selected room for booking.

    • Reserved

      private void Reserved(String customerName, Hotel chosenHotel, Date checkIn, Date checkOut, Room room)
      Confirms the reservation for the selected room and customer.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer.
      chosenHotel - The hotel where the room is booked.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      room - The selected room for booking.
